name: Baby witch 2d adventure
description:
The tier that separates of the nature world was broken
by the darkness forces, after that the chaos and fear in nature was fixed, 
the world became dark and gloomy. 
but still had a hope, the guardian of nature will fighting to ban the darkness forces
he is Baby Witch together with spirits of the elements.

Feature -
2D platformer adventure
resolution 600 x 400
10 environments
received tribute when finished environments level
upgrade your power elements with points tribute
